sentences.en: The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
sentences.cn: 部队生活相对而言仍然简朴。

sentences.en: The players have comparatively long periods of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 这些运动员有相当长的一段时间会无所事事。

sentences.en: The past few days have seemed comparatively flat and empty.
sentences.cn: 过去的几天似乎比较平淡和无聊。
